backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend-related features and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping summarizing key frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling Valentine prompt logic, evasive No button, and Good Choice meme reveal on Yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Auth context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed Tailwind CSS variables, utilities, and typography overrides for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint wrapping App with InternetIdentity and react-query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme with romantic color tokens, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, Valentine proposal page features, image requirements, and current functional requirements including updated Yes-click behavior with two static images.
